devdoc.author: Shumpei Koike - <shumpei.koike@bridges.inc>

accept(uint256).details: Accepts the proposal if you like the content.

bid(uint256,string).details: Bids to the post, sharing what kind of Ads would be public. The owner of the Ad space can select the one according to not only the price but also the preference inside the metadata.

params.metadata: string of the hashed path to the storage

book(uint256).details: Books to the post without any specific metadata.

call(uint256).details: Calls the book related with the bidId. The NFT representing a right to propose is sent to the bidder in this function.

close(uint256).details: Closes the offering and mints the NFT to the successful bidder. The amount would be paid to the post owner.

deny(uint256).details: Denies the proposal if you dislike the content.

displayByMetadata(address,string).details: Returns metadata hash that the account is supposed to deliver.

newPost(uint256,string,uint256,uint256).details: Creates a new post where the owner who has the advertising area can public the space. The basic infomation of the area is described on the storage, which is accessed by the metadata hash.

params.fromTimestamp: uint256 of the timestamp to display the ad
params.metadata: string of the hashed path to the storage
params.minPrice: uint256 of the minimum price to bid or book
params.toTimestamp: uint256 of the timestamp to display the ad

params.metadata: string of the hashed path to the storage

refund(uint256).details: Can refund the amount if you want to cancel or the other is determinted as the successful bidder.

devdoc.title: MediaFacade - allows anyone to create a post and bit to the post.
